Documentation
=============
The PyGeos-pandas library consists of 4 major parts:

   :doc:`GeosArray <array>`
   :doc:`GeosDtype <dtype>`
   :doc:`Series Accessor <series>`
   :doc:`DataFrame Accessor <dataframe>`
